destination.name: Padar Island
destination.description: Padar Labuan Bajo Island have four bays with colorful sands, most of them are white sands though there are alsk those with grey and pink colors.

destination.name: Kanawa Island
destination.description: An island with a beautiful blue gradient water, a perfect island for relaxing due to it's peaceful environment, Its turquoise water is exceptionally calm and clear.

destination.name: Rangko Cave
destination.description: A cave that provides nature beauties and have a unique salt water pond with a 3-4 meters depth.The best time to visit is during the low tide.

destination.name: Kelor Island
destination.description: A peaceful island with soft and pristine sands along with clear waters where you can view the beautiful corals beneath them.

destination.name: Taka Makassar Island
destination.description: Taka Makassar island and its surrounding coral reef, a perfect island for those who loves to diving, despite it tiny size and diving focus.

culinary.name: Baccala Bajo
culinary.description: One of the most visited seafood restaurants by tourists, besides selling various types of seafood they also sell vegetarian food.

culinary.name: Carpenter Cafe
culinary.description: Specialty cafe with locally sourced casual eats food concept, serves coffee with a typical Flores taste, the location is close to the city center.

culinary.name: Kampung Ujung
culinary.description: In this place there are stalls and carts selling snacks. The location of Kampung Ujung is close to the port, so most of the sellers offer seafood dishes.

culinary.name: Warung Mama
culinary.description: place to eat that serves a variety of Indonesian food that offers a variety of menus start from meat, chicken, fish, squid, shrimp, and stir-fried vegetables.

culinary.name: Treetop seafood Restaurant
culinary.description: Besides serving delicious food, this restaurant also offers beautiful views, so we can enjoy the beautiful waters of Komodo National Park from this place.
